[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” el_class=”about-us-page-title” css=”.vc_custom_1509822936731{margin-bottom: 60px !important;padding-top: 200px !important;padding-bottom: 150px !important;background-image: url(https://1800remodel.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/11/flooring.jpg?id=3438) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Flooring” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:42|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff” css=”.vc_custom_1509822952651{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Upgrade Your Home with Professional Flooring” font_container=”tag:p|font_size:22|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff”][vc_column_text el_class=”scroll_bottom”]GET A FREE QUOTE[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1510656426066{padding-bottom: 100px !important;}” el_class=”landing_icons”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″][vc_custom_heading text=”Beautiful Flooring” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:36|text_align:left|color:%231d2634″ el_class=”heading-title” css=”.vc_custom_1509822973201{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1509822987358{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}”]Few things really change the look of your home like getting new flooring. Getting new floors can be surprisingly low hassle, as professionals can come to your home, for free, and go over all the best available options. Get quotes on what beautiful new flooring will cost for your home. Here are just a few flooring options, depending on your personal preferences.[/vc_column_text][vc_single_image image=”3814″ img_size=”full” css=”.vc_custom_1513853147577{margin-top: 40px !important;}”][/vc_column][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1513795275703{margin-top: 12px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}” offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-2 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″][vc_row_inner el_class=”image_icon” css=”.vc_custom_1513795266112{margin-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_inner][vc_single_image image=”3470″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][vc_custom_heading text=”Carpet – Cozy and practical. Tons of carpet options are available for every room in your home.” font_container=”tag:p|font_size:14|text_align:left|color:%23333333″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner el_class=”image_icon”][vc_column_inner][vc_single_image image=”3469″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][vc_custom_heading text=”Laminate – Lower cost alternative to real wood floors that resists scratches, wear and fading” font_container=”tag:p|font_size:14|text_align:left|color:%23333333″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner el_class=”image_icon”][vc_column_inner][vc_single_image image=”3468″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][vc_custom_heading text=”Hardwood – Hardwood is the highest in quality flooring, and greatly increases your home value” font_container=”tag:p|font_size:14|text_align:left|color:%23333333″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner el_class=”image_icon”][vc_column_inner][vc_single_image image=”3467″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][vc_custom_heading text=”Vinyl – A high quality, low cost alternative to wood flooring. Has the same wood grain patterns, textures and colors.” font_container=”tag:p|font_size:14|text_align:left|color:%23333333″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner el_class=”image_icon”][vc_column_inner][vc_single_image image=”3466″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][vc_custom_heading text=”Tile – Porcelain and ceramic tiles are extremely beautiful, durable, and easy to clean. Great for high traffic rooms or a kitchen.” font_container=”tag:p|font_size:14|text_align:left|color:%23333333″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” el_class=”rm-form another” css=”.vc_custom_1510654903881{background-image: url(https://1800remodel.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/11/f_contact.jpg?id=3437) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_id=”scroll-form”][vc_column][thememove_contact2 title=”Call us now at 1-800-736-6335 or fill out the short form” text=”By submitting your information, you authorize up to four home improvement companies that can help with your project, and/or Protect Your Home – ADT Authorized Premier Provider, to call you on the phone number provided, and you understand that they may use email marketing and/or automated phone technology to contact you, which may include artificial or pre-recorded calls and/or text messages, and that your consent is not required to purchase products or services.” form=”2932″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” parallax=”content-moving” parallax_image=”1400″ css=”.vc_custom_1509809060162{padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;background-color: #008daf !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1439360282029{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”3409″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1509809006135{margin-bottom: 25px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Home Upgrades” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:24|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff” css=”.vc_custom_1509809122841{margin-top: 5px !important;margin-bottom: 5px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Upgrading your home just makes sense. You can lower your energy bills, increase your home value, and enjoy your home’s beauty.” font_container=”tag:p|font_size:14|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1439360289713{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”3410″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1509809082908{margin-bottom: 25px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Quickly Get Quotes” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:20|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff” css=”.vc_custom_1485983643161{margin-top: 5px !important;margin-bottom: 5px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Instead of shopping around yourself, with all the risks and time involved, 1800Remodel connects you with the most trusted names in the industry.” font_container=”tag:p|font_size:14|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1439360299267{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”3411″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1509809092277{margin-bottom: 25px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Compare and Save” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:20|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff” css=”.vc_custom_1485983734255{margin-top: 5px !important;margin-bottom: 5px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Once you have all the information and quotes you need, you are able to make an informed decision on the best company for your job.” font_container=”tag:p|font_size:14|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” el_class=”middle new_bottom” css=”.vc_custom_1509716090941{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 65px !important;padding-bottom: 68px !important;background-color: #eeeeee !important;}”][vc_column el_class=”center”][vc_custom_heading text=”Our team is ready to serve you” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:30|text_align:center|color:%23333333|line_height:1.2″][vc_column_text]

Get started on your dream project!

[/vc_column_text][thememove_button text=”FIND HOME IMPROVEMENT EXPERT” link=”url:http%3A%2F%2Fnew.1800remodel.com%2Fcontact%2F|||”][/vc_column][/vc_row]
